title: Is there any device for my phone that I can use to listen to what two people are talking about on their phones? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, it's called a Parabolic microphone.  According to Wikipedia: A parabolic microphone is a microphone that uses a parabolic reflector to collect and focus sound waves onto a receiver, in much the same way that a parabolic antenna (e.g., satellite dish) does with radio waves. You would need to catch the person speaking to a person on Speakerphone, and listen to the call using one of these devices.
I'm definitely sure there isn't a reasonably seized portable device or app that would do this kind of work. But if you're hell bent on this, then there's the option of hiring spies.
